titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the safety of His Majesties navy, and the kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by Wing CD-ROM, 1996 and Madan.
The dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end: Given at our court at Oxford, this tenth day of February, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne.
Arms 37; Steele notation: and lignant haynous.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
